```{r echo=FALSE}
# clean up some file system stuff
folders <- c("_manuscripts","_posts", "docs")
files <- c(".DS_Store", 
           "* 2.html", "* 3.html", "* 4.html",
           "* 2.png", "* 3.png", "* 4.png",
           "* 2.jpeg", "* 3.jpeg", "* 4.jpeg",
           "* 2.jpg", "* 3.jpg", "* 4.jpg",
           "* 2.js", "* 3.js", "* 4.js",
           "* 2.Rmd", "* 3.Rmd", "* 4.Rmd",
           "* 2.bib", "* 3.bib", "* 4.bib",
           "* 2.css", "* 3.css", "* 4.css",
           "*.icloud")

for( folder in folders ) { 
  for( file in files ) { 
    cmd <- paste( "find ", folder, " -type f -iname ", "'", file,"' -delete", sep="" )
    system( cmd )
  }
}
```
